Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Somewhere \Some"where`\, adv. In some place unknown or not specified; in one place or another. ``Somewhere nigh at hand.'' --Milton. [1913 Webster]

somewhere n : an indefinite or unknown location; "they moved to somewhere in Spain" adv : in or at or to some place; "she must be somewhere"; (`someplace' is used informally for `somewhere') [syn: {someplace}]
